name: Barong Tagalog - House of HABI
description: Authentic Barong Tagalog from House of HABI, a local artisan shop in Cagayan de Oro. Perfect for formal events.

name: Carmen's Kitchen Strawberry Jam
description: Homemade Strawberry Jam from Carmen's Kitchen in Cagayan de Oro. Made with locally sourced strawberries.

name: Tagolwanen Women Weavers Basket
description: Handwoven basket by the Tagolwanen Women Weavers of Cagayan de Oro. Perfect for storage or decoration.

name: Cebu's Best Dried Mangoes
description: Premium dried mangoes from Cebu's Best, now available at local stores in Cagayan de Oro.

name: Capiz Shell Lantern from Oro Handicrafts
description: Decorative lantern made from Capiz shells by Oro Handicrafts, a local shop in Cagayan de Oro.

name: Apo ni Lola Tablea
description: Rich and flavorful tablea from Apo ni Lola, sourced locally and sold in Cagayan de Oro.

name: Mother of Pearl Inlaid Box by CDO Crafts
description: Elegant jewelry box inlaid with mother of pearl, handcrafted by CDO Crafts artisans.

name: Inaul Scarf from Mindanao Silk
description: Vibrant and intricately woven Inaul cloth from Mindanao Silk, available at local markets in Cagayan de Oro.
